text: Sarah Dash (August 18, 1945 - September 20, 2021) was an American singer- songwriter and actress. Her career began as a member of Patti LaBelle & The Bluebelles. Dash worked for LaBelle, The Rolling Stones, and Keith Richards. She was born in Trenton, New Jersey. She appeared in the movie Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Heart's Club Band. Dash died, aged 76, on September 20, 2021. "Sarah Dash of Labelle dies at age 76", Soul Tracks. title: Sarah Dash
